com.mele.games.hex.ui

Class CellRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mele.games.hex.ui.CellRenderer

  • public class CellRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Isolates the rendering logic for cells from the underlying game logic content. This is a tool of the "view" in the MVC pattern.
    Author:
    Al Mele
